title: Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms with Spinach and Feta

Ingredients.5: 0.5 teaspoon dehydrated minced garlic, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line two 9x13-inch baking pans with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Place 2 mushroom caps in each prepared baking pan. Place 2 tablespoons feta cheese in each cap, then top with 1/4 cup spinach and 2 more tablespoons feta. Layer tomato slices over top, sprinkle with garlic, and season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.

Directions.4: Drizzle with balsamic vinegar just before serving.
